=== Bug Triaging ===
Bug triaging means the process of improving a reported bug to the point that it has all the information for developers to start working on it.

* <nowiki>[[Bugs-Triage|Guide on triaging bugs]]</nowiki>

=== SRU Verification ===
After a bug is fixed and an update has been made for the stable version of Ubuntu, it goes through a process called SRU verification. This process verifies that the updates fix the original bug and do not introduce new regression bugs.

* <nowiki>[[QATeam-PerformingSRUVerification|Guide on doing SRU verification]]</nowiki>

=== Supporting Tasks ===

==== Handle Papercuts ====
Papercuts are trivial to fix, but annoying bugs. Ideal for getting started helping with bugs.

* <nowiki>[[One Hundred Papercuts|One Hundred Papercuts project]]</nowiki>
